Played many Kaos ripped games and this is the only one I'm less than happy with. The unpacker doesn't rebuild the game according to how the original is. Some of the sound files have been altered and re-encoded improperly, resulting in no radio music in the game. More sounds could be affected too though I haven't played long enough to find out. Also the fallout.ini in the documents folder keeps defaulting to read only for some reason.

None of these things happen with the full version of the game, such as the one by Skidrow. I suggest new downloaders get that version instead. It's 3gb larger but plays 100% perfect upon install.
